Translations.Text: elem tera enne-llahe sehhara lekum ma fi-l'ardi velfulke tecri fi-lbahri biemrih. veyumsiku-ssemae en teka`a `ale-l'ardi illa biiznih. inne-llahe binnasi leraufur rahim
vehuve-llezi ahyakum. summe yumitukum summe yuhyikum. inne-l'insane lekefur
likulli ummetin ce`alna menseken hum nasikuhu fela yunazi`anneke fi-l'emri ved`u ila rabbik. inneke le`ala hudem mustekim
vein cadeluke fekuli-llahu a`lemu bima ta`melun
allahu yahkumu beynekum yevme-lkiyameti fima kuntum fihi tahtelifun
elem ta`lem enne-llahe ya`lemu ma fi-ssemai vel'ard. inne zalike fi kitab. inne zalike `ale-llahi yesir
veya`budune min duni-llahi ma lem yunezzil bihi sultanev vema leyse lehum bihi `ilm. vema lizzalimine min nesir

veiza tutla `aleyhim ayatuna beyyinatin ta`rifu fi vucuhi-llezine keferu-lmunker. yekadune yestune billezine yetlune `aleyhim ayatina. kul efeunebbiukum biserrim min zalikum. ennar. ve`adehe-llahu-llezine keferu. vebi'se-lmesir
